botMessages.message: Hi! I’m Mascot, the Admissions Bot.
Would you like me to connect you to an agent who can assist further?
Thanks for taking the time to chat!
Sorry, I’m still learning. I’m afraid I didn’t understand that, can you please try again?
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment. Please try again during our business hours.
Here are a few things I can help with. Please select from the following options:
Thank you.
It looks like I couldn't find any articles about that topic.
Got it.

{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}.
Learn More: {!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Chatbot_URL__c}
Can I help you with anything else?
contact ID was established
Let’s get you in touch with an Admissions Counselor

Would you like to learn more about next steps now that your application is complete?

Can I help you with anything else?
Can I help you with anything else?
Let me check for your application.
OK, here’s what I found:
Your application is still {!Application_Status}.
Your application is still {!Application_Status} and {!ChecklistCompletionText}% of the required items are complete.
Would you like more information about the outstanding items?
Alright, here are the remaining required items.

Alright, here are the remaining required items.

Can I help you with anything else?
Sorry, we may not have a knowledge resource on that topic. Can you please try to search again?
OK, before we proceed, I'll need to verify your identity.
I'll send you an email with a temporary passcode.
You have searched too many times. Please contact our team.
What email address did you use on your application?

retryMessages.message: Your email should be something like mascot@salesforce.edu

botMessages.message: Thanks.
Let’s try again.
Oops, I found multiple applications with that email address. Please connect with an Admissions Counselor.

botDialogs.description: Will ask the visitor to provide an email address, which can be validated against the Contact and Application records.
botDialogs.label: Check email is valid for a Contact

botMessages.message: Alright, I just sent you an email with the passcode.
Please check your email and enter the code here.

retryMessages.message: The code we sent is 8 characters, upper-case letters and numbers. Please try again.

botMessages.message: This code was not received within the time limit. Note you only have 5 minutes to enter the code.
Thank you.

botDialogs.description: sends an email verification code to the client, to verify their email address.
botDialogs.label: Verification Code Send

botMessages.message: Can I help you with anything else?
Looks like you have multiple applications open. Contact an admissions counselor for help.
You have searched too many times. Please contact our team.
That code didn't match what I was expecting. Can you please re-enter the code.

retryMessages.message: The code we sent is 8 characters, upper-case letters and numbers. Please try again.

botMessages.message: This code was not received within the time limit. Please reach out to an Admissions Counsellor.

botDialogs.description: if the verification flow is wrong the first time, then run the process again, with revised language.
botDialogs.label: Verification Code Resend

botMessages.message: I seem to have a problem finding that email. Please contact our team.
I wasn't able to find that email address in the system. Could you provide the email again?
Opps, I found multiple applications with that email address. Please call an Admissions Counsellor.

botDialogs.description: When an email is not found the first time, ask the user to search again.
botDialogs.label: Email Search (Retry)

botMessages.message: It looks like we don't have any applications on file based on your information. Let me see if I can connect you with someone that can help you.
Can I help you with anything else?
It appears you have multiple applications. Let me see if I can connect you with someone that can help you with them.

{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}
Learn More: {!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Chatbot_URL__c}
Can I help you with anything else?
